document.full_text: long-hitting bubba watson maintained ice-cool composure to clinch his third pga tour title in a gripping playoff with fellow american webb simpson for the new orleans classic sunday.
document.title: watson beats simpson in new orleans playoff
lines_and_colors: long-hitting bubba watson maintained ice-cool composure to clinch his third pga tour title in a gripping playoff with fellow american webb simpson for the new orleans classic sunday.
